headline: Can Park Hotels & Resorts (PK) Turn ESG Recognition and RevPAR Tailwinds Into Lasting Pricing Power?
summary: Truist recently raised its 2026 RevPAR growth projections for U.S. hotels and upgraded several operators, while Park Hotels & Resorts released its 2025 Corporate Responsibility Report and scheduled its Q4 and full-year 2025 earnings call for February 2026. Park’s recognition for sustainability leadership and responsible governance, including a Prime ISS ESG rating, may influence how investors assess its long-term positioning within an improving hotel industry outlook. Next, we’ll examine how...
